projects.title: React Livestream Platform
projects.description: My first deep dive in using react. I built this from scratch using HTML, SCSS and React. This taught me many aspects of building for the web. I used the syntax for function components. I learned how to implement React-Router. I used the rest API to pull Vimeo Videos and populate cards using javascript and json. I converted this design from a Figma file to build a responsive website.

projects.title: Author Landing Page
projects.description: This Marketing page was built for the author of Geriatric Notes to give their customer base a place to contact and order their book. I used BootStrap 5 and css to build the Front End and for the Back End, hosted it on netlify and as well as connected the contact form to netlify form submission collecting tool.

projects.title: WP Livestream Platform
projects.description: Using WordPress/Divi I built a Live Streaming Platform to host interviews with an archive and a landing page. This involved integrating the Embedding live stream events. I built it using the multi-site option, to allow it to be easily duplicatable, to be reused depending on the theme of the interviews. I set up the DNS for the main site as well as the subsites.

projects.title: Ehya Landing Example
projects.description: An example of a polished landing page, that I converted from a figma design into html, css and javascript using bootstrap 5. It is responsive.

projects.title: Light Tower
projects.description: My first Hackathon and first time working within a team. A wonderful experience of staying up for 48 hours! Working alongside two UX designers, I converted their  Figma Design into a responsive landing page using vue and css, learning how to harness the strength of flex box!

projects.title: Help Beacon
projects.description: Teamed up with two front-end devs, a backend dev and three designers we built an app that allows people in crisis to reach out to their support group. I led the charge in building the landing page using bootstrap 5 and taught a git/github workflow. (ill add a more a specific description. After that we built a lot of the app on react using BootStrap React.

projects.title: Ventia
projects.description: Combined with the help of an experienced backend dev, and an experienced frontend developer, I learned how to style a react project using a a reusable theme page, and CSS-in-JS, a different approach to styling that I had experienced. I also learned about server-side rendering and using next.js in tandem with with react to create a speedy application.
